name: dotnet-claude-code-skills
description: Production-ready DDD skills for Claude Code: Domain-Driven Design, data persistence patterns, and BDD-style unit testing. Explained in C# and .NET but applicable to any OOP language.
author: nesbo

skills.name: Domain-Driven Design Patterns
skills.description: Comprehensive guide to implementing DDD patterns with CQRS, Hexagonal Architecture, aggregates, entities, command/query handlers, and domain best practices. Explained using C# and .NET, but patterns apply to any OOP language.

skills.name: Data Persistence Layer
skills.description: Complete guide to implementing data persistence as an adapter in hexagonal architecture with entity mappings, repositories, Unit of Work, and migration workflows. Demonstrates one ORM approach; patterns apply to any data access technology.

skills.name: BDD-Style Unit Testing
skills.description: BDD-style unit testing patterns for domain handlers with in-memory database, TestDataBuilder pattern, fluent builders, and fake implementations - no mocking frameworks. Shown with NUnit examples; patterns apply to any testing framework.

skills.name: Add Serena MCP to Your Project
skills.description: Complete integration guide for adding Serena MCP to any software project. Provides IDE-like semantic code understanding through LSP integration, symbol-level navigation, and precise code editing. Includes prerequisites checking, installation steps, configuration templates for C#, Python, TypeScript and more, troubleshooting guide, and advanced configurations.

categories.name: OOP Development
categories.description: Skills for object-oriented development (demonstrated in .NET and C#, applicable to any OOP language)

categories.name: Tool Integration
categories.description: Skills for integrating development tools and services with Claude Code
